name: invoice-ninja
tagline: An open source invoicing, billing, and time tracking platform for businesses
description: Invoice Ninja is an open source invoicing, billing and time tracking platform for freelancers and small businesses. It supports quotes, recurring invoices, payments, client portal and multi currency, with both self hosted and hosted editions.

features.title: Invoice Creation
features.description: Creates professional invoices for clients and customers

features.title: Client Management
features.description: Stores and manages customer contact and billing information

features.title: Online Payments
features.description: Accepts and records payments through supported gateways

features.title: Recurring Billing
features.description: Automates invoices that repeat on defined schedules

features.title: Expense Tracking
features.description: Records business expenses associated with invoices

features.title: Financial Reporting
features.description: Generates summaries and reports for accounting purposes

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manages invoicing and clients through a browser

features.title: Self-Hosted Invoicing Platform
features.description: Runs the invoicing system on your own infrastructure
